thread.title: Arsenal striker Lucas Perez set to be handed route back to Spain as La Liga side Sevilla are monitoring his situation at the Emirates
thread.title_full: Arsenal striker Lucas Perez set to be handed route back to Spain as La Liga side Sevilla are monitoring his situation at the Emirates

author: mheathsmith
title: Arsenal striker Lucas Perez set to be handed route back to Spain as La Liga side Sevilla are monitoring his situation at the Emirates
text:
EFL Come and get me Arsenal striker Lucas Perez set to be handed route back to Spain as La Liga side Sevilla are monitoring his situation at the Emirates 
The 28-year-old has struggled to hold down a starting spot with the Gunners and has been restricted to cameo appearances off the bench by mike mcgrath
